name: Yoshi the Dog Dress-up 🐕💨
description:
A lil picrew-type toy where you can sort of dress up my dog Yoshi! 

I was making this for a page on my website/art shop www.creachur.com called Yoshi's Corner, but I haven't worked on it in a while because I'm just too busy! So it's a little barebones--for now.

Credit: I used Starscapes by Deep-Fold to make the sweet background! Link: https://deep-fold.itch.io/starscapes
